title: Genetic Findings
description: Schema for genetic findings related to participants in genetic research.

genetic_findings_id.description: Unique identifier for the genetic finding.

participant_id.description: Identifier for the participant associated with this genetic finding.

experiment_id.description: Identifier for the experiment where the genetic finding was identified.

sv_type.description: Specific type of structural variant, if applicable.

variant_reference_assembly.description: The genome build used for identifying the variant's position.

chrom.description: Chromosome on which the variant is located.

chrom_end.description: End position of the chromosome where the structural variant ends.

pos.description: Start position of the variant on the chromosome.

pos_end.description: End position of the variant on the chromosome.

ClinGen_allele_ID.description: ClinGen Allele ID for cross-table reference.

gene_of_interest.description: HGNC approved symbol of the known or candidate gene(s) relevant for the phenotype.

transcript.description: Description of transcript overlapping the variant.

hgvsc.description: HGVS c. notation description of the variant.

hgvsp.description: HGVS p. notation description of the variant.

hgvs.description: Genomic HGVS description of the variant.

allele_balance_or_heteroplasmy_percentag.description: Reported allele balance (mosaic) or heteroplasmy percentage (mitochondrial).

gene_known_for_phenotype.description: Indicates if the gene listed is a candidate or known disease gene.

known_condition_name.description: Free text of condition name consistent with the variant/phenotype/inheritance.

condition_id.description: MONDO/OMIM number for condition used for variant interpretation.

condition_inheritance.description: Description of the expected inheritance of condition used for variant interpretation.

GREGoR_variant_classification.description: Clinical significance of variant described to condition listed as determined by the RC's variant curation.

GREGoR_ClinVar_SCV.description: ClinVar accession number for the variant curation submitted by your center.

gene_disease_validity.description: Validity assessment of the gene-disease relationship.

public_database_other.description: Public databases that this variant in this participant has been submitted by the RC.

phenotype_contribution.description: Contribution of variant-linked condition to participant's phenotype.

partial_contribution_explained.description: List of specific phenotypes explained by the condition associated with this variant/gene in cases of partial contribution.

additional_family_members_with_variant.description: List of related participant IDs carrying the same variant.

method_of_discovery.description: The method/assay(s) used to identify the candidate.

notes.description: Free text field to explain edge cases or discovery updates or list parallel experiment IDs or list parental allele balance when mosaic... etc.
